info.title: XENI APP
info.description: REST services for managing your API ecosystem.

post.summary: Get the flights content with Prices for a given itinerary/Dates
post.description: Shopping request for a certain itinerary, dates, passengerTypesQuantity.

data.description: container of shopping success response object.

flights.description: Dictionary of flights for the originDestination sequence.

pricedItinerariesReference.description: List of Prices applicable per FareFamily for journeys.

fareFamilies.description: The list of available Fare Families per carrier content.

fareFamilyId.description: The code of the fare family associated to Pricing option.

code.description: Code of bundle service or RFISC

type.description: Status of the service in the Bundle.

cheapFlight.description: Holds the cheapeast journey in the offered list.

bestFlight.description: Holds the Best Option journey in the offered list.

quickFlight.description: Holds the Best Option based on Duration time of the journey in the offered list.

requestBody.description: The request payload schema of create bookings

air.description: Contain the details of flight itinerary.

segments.description: Contains the list of flight segments

priceInformation.description: Details of fare per passenger Type

departureDate.description: The departure date of the O&D segment.

fareType.description: The type of the price to process the shopping.

fareDiscounts.description: Enter the data for discount programs

bulkFare.description: Code to add for Bulk Fares pricing - Type Private

InclusiveTour.description: Code to add inclusive tour pricing - type Private

carrierCode.description: Carrier that validates the discount code.

discountCode.description: Account code to apply in quotation.

preferredCarrierList.description: Preference carriers for a certain OriginDestination

excludeCarriers.description: Carriers to exclude for a certain originDestination object

arrivalDateTime.description: Local date and time of the flight arrival.

operatingCarrierCode.description: Carrier code of the operating airline.

operatingCarrierLogo.description: URL of operating carrier logo image.

operatingCarrierRBD.description: The RBD for the operating carrier.

OB.flightsInformation.description: Dictionary of Flights for a certain O&D.

airlineLogo.description: Logo image of the Marketing Airline.

departureDateTime.description: Local date and time of flight departure point of the flight.

arrivalAirportName.description: Name of the arrival airport of the segment.

arrivalDateTime.description: Local date and time of the flight arrival.

items.description: Hold the offer combination priced reference.

PriceReferenceId.description: Reference Id to priced itinerary reference for price details.

flights.description: List of combination flights for the referenced priced.

fareFamily.description: Name of the applicable fareFamily for the priced offer.

bookingInstructions.description: Instruction to process the booking of the option.

flightId.description: Flight number applicable for the offer.

priceId.description: The unique reference id of the priced obj.

totalPrice.description: The total price of the Air itinerary service

pricePerOrigindestination.description: Average display price per originDestination component.

tax.description: The total taxes for the itinerary

markup.description: The Agency Markup in XENI App

serviceFee.description: The amount of service Fee charge for Seller

code.description: The applicable Code for the discount

passengerTypeCode.description: The IATA passegner Type Code applicable.

items.description: Each object associate the farebasis code with O&D and Flight Segment

flightId.description: Asssociation with flight Segment in the O&D

fareBasisCode.description: The applicable fare basis code for the specific segment.

passengerTypeCode.description: The PTC Standard code for pricing purposes /n Different from Passenger Type.

dateOfBirth.description: Date of passenger birth. ISO 8601-YYYY-MM-DD format

identification.description: National ID normally requested for FOID SSR.

specialRequests.description: List of special services to request.

serviceCode.description: The code of the SSR to Request.

flighSegmentRPH.description: Association with Flight Segment in the booking.

shoppingId.description: Reference to the ShoppingRS to hold the Journey to book.

priceReferenceId.description: Reference to the Price Option from the Shopping RS.

flightId.description: Join of Carrier code and Flight Number

rbd.description: Reservation booking designator - Class of booking.

departureAirport.description: 3 Chars code of IATA Departure airport

arrivalAirport.description: 3 Chars code of IATA Departure airport

departureDate.description: The departure date of the O&D segment.

flightRPH.description: Association with the Flight segment to add Seat.

travelerRPH.description: Travel Reference to book seat for.

seat.description: The number of the seat (Row number).

seatCode.description: Code of RFISC for the Selected Seat.
